sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Using componendo and dividendo, find the value of \(x \) given that 
\[
	\frac{\sqrt{8 x + 5 } + \sqrt{8 x - 9 }}{\sqrt{8 x + 5 } - \sqrt{8 x - 9 }} = 4 
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "The given equation is 
\[
	\frac{\sqrt{8 x + 5 } + \sqrt{8 x - 9 }}{\sqrt{8 x + 5 } - \sqrt{8 x - 9 }} = 4 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
By using componendo and dividendo and simplifying, we get
\[
	\frac{\input[s2v1]{} \sqrt{8 x + 5 }}{2 \sqrt{8 x - 9 }} = \frac{4 + 1 }{\input[s2v2]{} - 1 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{\sqrt{8 x + 5 }}{\sqrt{8 x - 9 }} = \frac{5 }{3 }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{8 x + 5 }{8 x - 9 } = \frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{9 }
\]
Now, cross multiplying and simplifying, we get
\[
	72 x + 45 = \input[s3v2]{} x - 225 
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 128 x = \input[s4v1]{}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow x = \frac{135 }{\input[s4v2]{} }
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [2, 4], "text": "$$\text{Upon applying componendo and dividendo on $\frac{\sqrt{8 x + 5 } + \sqrt{8 x - 9 }}{\sqrt{8 x + 5 } - \sqrt{8 x - 9 }} = 4 $, we get $\frac{\sqrt{8 x + 5 }}{\sqrt{8 x - 9 }} = \frac{5 }{3 }$}$$ "}, {"data": [25, 200], "text": "$$\text{Further simplification of the previous equation gives us the result $72 x + 45 = 200 x - 225 $}$$ "}, {"data": [270, 64], "text": "$$\text{Finally, we get the result $x = \frac{135 }{64 }$}$$"}]
